channel.title: Comics on 2D Steve
channel.description: Recent content in Comics on 2D Steve

item.title: Two of My Favorite People
item.description: I missed blogging yesterday, but I’m going to have a whole post about why that happened.

item.title: Back in the Saddle
item.description: I feel like I may die. Okay, that was a bit dramatic, but I think it’s accurate.

item.title: It's 1/1/11!!11!
item.description: This is my first post of the new year, 2011. It’s a whole lot like the last post I had from 2010, in that it contains text.

item.title: The Walking Dead
item.description: I saw the new AMC series, The Walking Dead, last night.

item.title: The Walking Dead
item.description: I have just completed reading all of the current volumes of The Walking Dead, and I have to say that this is the most compelling and interesting comic that is being written today.
